plugin.title: Audiodescription
plugin.compatibility: Compatible with 4.1; controlbar button works from 4.3; state/volume flashvars work from 4.4.
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This plugin plays a closed audiodescription with a video. For the 4.3 player or higher, the plugin will place a button in the controlbar.

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: Location of the audiodescription MP3 to play.

flashvar.name: state
flashvar.description: Set this to false to turn off the audiodescription by default.

flashvar.name: volume
flashvar.description: Volume of the audiodescription. Crank this even more up to have the AD overrule the default sound.
